title: Advise on Tax Implications of Home Sale
description: A couple is selling their primary residence and wants to know if they will owe capital gains tax.

tasks.description: Determine the home's cost basis (purchase price + improvements).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the cost basis.

tasks.description: Verify that the couple meets the ownership and use tests to qualify for the Section 121 exclusion.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the couple has lived in the home as their main residence for at least 2 of the last 5 years.

tasks.description: Calculate the gain on the sale and apply the maximum exclusion ($500,000 for a married couple) to determine if any gain is taxable.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the entire gain is excluded from income and no tax is due.
